title: Bug 118780: Alias set for columns in data set not reflected in expression builder when selecting the dataset
OB: When selecting the dataset in the expression builder, the old column names are shown instead of the alias that was set for the columns in the data set.
SR: Steps to Reproduce: 1. Create a new data source and a dataset. 2. Set an alias for the first column in the dataset as 'column1'. 3. Insert a data item and bind it to the dataset. 4. Open the expression builder and try to select the dataset. Note that the old column names are displayed instead of the alias.
